description: This file implements the WindowManagerConnector class which manages interactions with a WindowManager service, including initialization, display creation, and retrieving display info. It handles communication with an external window manager interface, manages plugin lifecycle, and provides utility functions related to display management.

classes.name: WindowManagerConnector
classes.description: Main class responsible for managing the connection and communication with the WindowManager service, including plugin lifecycle and display operations.
